meanings: continue, keep (on), go on, carry on

vlive.korean: 계속해? Should we keep going? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 그만!!!!끝끝!!!!!! 스포일러 방송에서 스포는 안된다는데요 (GOT7’s album spoilers)
[자칭 전문가 피셜] 이게 계속 해보면서 마셔야 해요! [Self-proclaimed expert] You need to try and drink! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Self-proclaimed expert] You need to try and drink!

vlive.korean: 연락 계속해? Are you keeping in touch with him? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 알바하다가 사귀는 애들 종특 [크네유] - EP.04
vlive.english: Are you keeping in touch with him?

vlive.korean: 하던 말 계속해봐 - 아 네! Continue what you were saying... - Ah yes! 듣기 View video VIXX : 택운이 빼고 동생들이 다했다ㅠㅠ.(오랜만에 빅스 외식) 🤔
vlive.english: Continue what you were saying... - Ah yes!

vlive.korean: 어떻게? 계속해? - 가위바위보! What? Continue? - Rock paper scissors! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 학교에 우리에 대한 소문이 돈다 [연애미수] EP02 좋아하는 사람이 있으니까.

examples.korean: Cut the chatter and get on with your work! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잡담 그만하고 일들이나 계속해! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Cut the chatter and get on with your work! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has been canvassing opinion on the issue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 이슈에 대해 여론 조사를 계속 해 오고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has been canvassing opinion on the issue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We all had colds and couldn’t stop sniffing and sneezing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모두 감기가 들어 코를 훌쩍이고 재채기를 계속해 댔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all had colds and couldn’t stop sniffing and sneezing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She didn’t waste time feeling sorry for herself—she just picked herself up and carried on. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자기 연민에 빠져 시간을 낭비하지 않았다. 그냥 다시 추스르고 계속해 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She didn’t waste time feeling sorry for herself—she just picked herself up and carried on. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Be quiet and get on with your work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조용히 하고 일이나 계속해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Be quiet and get on with your work. Add to Wordbook
